description: this is an yygen template paoject!!

scripts.build: npm run tsc:build && npm run optimize
scripts.tsc:build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && cp -R dist/esm dist/lib
scripts.optimize: npm run babel:cjs & npm run babel:mjs
scripts.publish2npm: npm run build && cp package.json README.md .npmignore dist && npm publish dist
